mod.name: QueenMod
mod.description: A deposed queen, set to conquer the spire and seize it as her own hive.

cards.name: Defend
cards.description: Gain 5 Block.

cards.name: Defend+
cards.description: Gain 8 Block.

cards.name: Drain
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage twice.
Gain queenmod:Nectar equal to the damage dealt.

cards.name: Drain+
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage twice.
Gain queenmod:Nectar equal to the damage dealt.

cards.name: Incubate
cards.description: Gain 5 queenmod:Swarm.

cards.name: Incubate+
cards.description: Gain 6 queenmod:Swarm.

cards.name: Recruit
cards.description:
queenmod:Recruit a queenmod:Hornet.
queenmod:Recruit a queenmod:Bumblebee

cards.name: Recruit+
cards.description:
queenmod:Recruit a queenmod:Hornet.
queenmod:Recruit a queenmod:Bumblebee

cards.name: Strike
cards.description: Deal 6 damage.

cards.name: Strike+
cards.description: Deal 9 damage.

cards.name: BumbleBee
cards.description: Gain 10 Block.

cards.name: BumbleBee+
cards.description: Gain 13 Block.

cards.name: Bumblebee Commander
cards.description:
Gain 10 Block.
Upgrade all queenmod:Bumblebees in your draw pile.

cards.name: Bumblebee Commander+
cards.description:
Gain 13 Block.
Upgrade all queenmod:Bumblebees in your draw pile.

cards.name: Drone
cards.description:
Draw a card.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Drone Commander
cards.description:
Upgrade all queenmod:Drones in your draw pile.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Drone Commander+
cards.description:
Upgrade all queenmod:Drones in your draw pile.
Draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Drone+
cards.description:
Draw 2 cards.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Hornet
cards.description: Deal 11 damage.

cards.name: Hornet Commander
cards.description:
Deal 11 damage.
Upgrade all queenmod:Hornets in your draw pile.

cards.name: Hornet Commander+
cards.description:
Deal 15 damage.
Upgrade all queenmod:Hornets in your draw pile.

cards.name: Hornet+
cards.description: Deal 15 damage.

cards.name: Riposte
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
Ethereal.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Riposte+
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage.
Ethereal.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Worker Bee
cards.description:
Apply 1 queenmod:Pollinate.
Deal 2 damage.

cards.name: Worker Bee Commander
cards.description:
Deal 2 damage.
Inflict 1 queenmod:Pollinate.
Upgrade all queenmod:Workerbees in your draw pile.

cards.name: Worker Bee Commander+
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage.
Inflict 2 queenmod:Pollinate.
Upgrade all queenmod:Workerbees in your draw pile.

cards.name: Worker Bee+
cards.description:
Apply 2 queenmod:Pollinate.
Deal 4 damage.

cards.name: Anticipate
cards.description: queenmod:Recruit a queenmod:Hive card based on enemy intent, and add it to your hand.

cards.name: Anticipate+
cards.description: queenmod:Recruit a queenmod:Hive card based on enemy intent, and add it to your hand.

cards.name: Attack Order
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
queenmod:Recruit a queenmod:Hornet.

cards.name: Attack Order+
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
queenmod:Recruit 2 queenmod:Hornets.

cards.name: Beekeeping
cards.description:
Exhaust 1 card.
Add a queenmod:Bumblebee to your hand.

cards.name: Beekeeping+
cards.description:
Exhaust 1 card.
Add an upgraded queenmod:Bumblebee to your hand.

cards.name: Blinding Swarm
cards.description:
Apply 1 Weak to all enemies.
Split your queenmod:Swarm among all enemies for the turn.

cards.name: Blinding Swarm+
cards.description:
Apply 2 Weak to all enemies.
Split your queenmod:Swarm among all enemies for the turn.

cards.name: Build Order
cards.description:
Gain !QueenMod:second! queenmod:Production.
Recruit a queenmod:Workerbee.

cards.name: Build Order+
cards.description:
Gain !QueenMod:second! queenmod:Production.
Recruit 2 queenmod:Workerbees.

cards.name: Chain strike
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
If you've played 6 or more cards this turn, draw a card and gain [E] .

cards.name: Chain strike+
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
If you've played 4 or more cards this turn, draw a card and gain [E] .

cards.name: Charge!
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage.
Draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Charge!+
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
Draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Conscripts
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage.
When you add this to your deck, add two additional copies.

cards.name: Conscripts+
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
When you add this to your deck, add two additional copies.

cards.name: Cross-guard
cards.description: Gain 3 Block for each Attack in your hand.

cards.name: Cross-guard+
cards.description: Gain 4 Block for each Attack in your hand.

cards.name: Defend Order
cards.description:
Gain 7 block.
queenmod:Recruit a queenmod:Bumblebee.

cards.name: Defend Order+
cards.description:
Gain 9 block.
queenmod:Recruit 2 queenmod:Bumblebees.

cards.name: Drone Spawner
cards.description: At the end of your turn, add a queenmod:Drone to your draw pile.

cards.name: Drone Spawner+
cards.description: At the end of your turn, add a queenmod:Drone to your draw pile.

cards.name: Fleche
cards.description:
Deal 13 damage.
Exhaust two random skills in your draw pile.

cards.name: Fleche+
cards.description:
Deal 17 damage.
Exhaust two random skills in your draw pile.

cards.name: Flyby
cards.description: Deal 3 damage to all enemies. Add this card to your draw pile instead of your discard pile.

cards.name: Flyby+
cards.description: Deal 5 damage to all enemies. Add this card to your draw pile instead of your discard pile.

cards.name: Frenzy
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage to all enemies.
Gain 9 Block.
Split your queenmod:Swarm among all enemies and yourself for the turn.

cards.name: Frenzy+
cards.description:
Deal 11 damage to all enemies.
Gain 11 Block.
Split your queenmod:Swarm among all enemies and yourself for the turn.

cards.name: Full Retreat
cards.description:
Gain 16 Block.
Shuffle your hand into your draw pile.

cards.name: Full Retreat+
cards.description:
Gain 20 Block.
Shuffle your hand into your draw pile.

cards.name: Gather
cards.description:
Gain 4 queenmod:Nectar.
queenmod:Recruit !QueenMod:second! queenmod:Workerbee.

cards.name: Gather+
cards.description:
Gain 6 queenmod:Nectar.
queenmod:Recruit !QueenMod:second! queenmod:Workerbees.

cards.name: Gathering Swarm
cards.description: At the start of your turn, spend 2 queenmod:Nectar to gain 2 queenmod:Swarm.

cards.name: Gathering Swarm+
cards.description: At the start of your turn, spend 3 queenmod:Nectar to gain 3 queenmod:Swarm.

cards.name: Hex Guard
cards.description:
Gain 10 Block.
Spend 10 queenmod:Nectar: Gain 10 Block.

cards.name: Hex Guard+
cards.description:
Gain 12 Block.
Spend 10 queenmod:Nectar: Gain 12 Block.

cards.name: Hold Position
cards.description: Gain 7 block. Add 2 queenmod:Drones to your draw pile.

cards.name: Hold Position+
cards.description: Gain 9 block. Add 2 queenmod:Drones to your draw pile.

cards.name: Honey Corps
cards.description:
Draw 3 cards.
queenmod:Recruit 2 queenmod:Workerbees.

cards.name: Honey Corps+
cards.description:
Draw 4 cards.
queenmod:Recruit 2 queenmod:Workerbees.

cards.name: Honeycomb Smash
cards.description:
Deal 8 Damage.
Spend 10 queenmod:Nectar: Apply 2 Weak.

cards.name: Honeycomb Smash+
cards.description:
Deal 11 Damage.
Spend 10 queenmod:Nectar: Apply 3 Weak.

cards.name: Inspiring Strike
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Upgrade a random card in your draw pile.

cards.name: Inspiring Strike+
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
Upgrade 2 random cards in your draw pile.

cards.name: Lunge
cards.description: If the last card you played was a skill, deal 2 damage 2 times.

cards.name: Lunge+
cards.description: If the last card you played was a skill, deal 2 damage 3 times.

cards.name: Mark
cards.description: Apply 1 Vulnerable, 1 queenmod:Pollinate and your queenmod:Swarm for the turn.

cards.name: Mark+
cards.description: Apply 2 Vulnerable, 2 queenmod:Pollinate and your queenmod:Swarm for the turn.

cards.name: Mating Dance
cards.description:
Unplayable.
While in your hand, complete a queenmod:Dance to gain 5 queenmod:Swarm.

cards.name: Mating Dance+
cards.description:
Unplayable.
While in your hand, complete a queenmod:Dance to gain 8 queenmod:Swarm.

cards.name: Parry
cards.description:
Gain 5 block.
Apply 1 Vulnerable.
Add a queenmod:Riposte to your hand.

cards.name: Parry+
cards.description:
Gain 7 block.
Apply 1 Vulnerable.
Add a queenmod:Riposte+ to your hand.

cards.name: Pollen Blast
cards.description:
Deal 5 damage and inflict 1 queenmod:Pollinate to all enemies.
queenmod:Recruit 1 queenmod:Workerbee.

cards.name: Pollen Blast+
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage and inflict 2 queenmod:Pollinate to all enemies.
queenmod:Recruit 2 queenmod:Workerbee.

cards.name: Populate
cards.description: Add 3 queenmod:Drones to your Draw Pile.

cards.name: Populate+
cards.description: Add 5 queenmod:Drones to your Draw Pile.

cards.name: Regroup
cards.description:
Gain 8 block.
Shuffle your discard pile into your deck.

cards.name: Regroup+
cards.description:
Gain 11 block.
Shuffle your discard pile into your deck.

cards.name: Reposition
cards.description:
Gain 1 Strength.
queenmod:Recruit a queenmod:Hornet.
Recall your queenmod:Swarm.

cards.name: Reposition+
cards.description:
Gain 1 Strength.
queenmod:Recruit a queenmod:Hornet.
Recall your queenmod:Swarm.

cards.name: Sharper Stingers
cards.description:
queenmod:Hornets do 5 more damage.
queenmod:Recruit 2 Hornets.

cards.name: Sharper Stingers+
cards.description:
queenmod:Hornets do 8 more damage.
queenmod:Recruit 2 Hornets.

cards.name: Spearhead
cards.description:
Deal 15 damage.
Spend 10 queenmod:Nectar: Deal 8 damage to all enemies.

cards.name: Spearhead+
cards.description:
Deal 18 damage.
Spend 10 queenmod:Nectar: Deal 11 damage to all enemies.

cards.name: Split Strike
cards.description:
Deal 8 Damage.
Recall half your queenmod:Swarm for the turn.

cards.name: Split Strike+
cards.description:
Deal 11 Damage.
Recall half your queenmod:Swarm for the turn.

cards.name: Stockpile
cards.description:
Gain [E] at the start of your turn for every 10 queenmod:Nectar.
queenmod:Recruit 2 queenmod:Workerbees.

cards.name: Stockpile+
cards.description:
Gain [E] at the start of your turn for every 10 queenmod:Nectar.
queenmod:Recruit 2 queenmod:Workerbees.

cards.name: Supply Lines
cards.description: Spend 10 queenmod:Nectar: Gain 10 queenmod:Swarm.

cards.name: Supply Lines+
cards.description: Spend 10 queenmod:Nectar: Gain 12 queenmod:Swarm.

cards.name: Ambush
cards.description: X random cards in your draw pile cost 0 until played.

cards.name: Ambush+
cards.description: X+1 random cards in your draw pile cost 0 until played.

cards.name: Assimilate
cards.description:
Exhaust all queenmod:Hive cards in your hand.
Gain 3 queenmod:Swarm for each.

cards.name: Assimilate+
cards.description:
Exhaust all queenmod:Hive cards in your hand.
Gain 4 queenmod:Swarm for each.

cards.name: Blitz
cards.description: Deal 5 damage. Add 2 Attacks from your Draw Pile to your hand.

cards.name: Blitz+
cards.description:
Innate.
Deal 5 damage. Add 2 Attacks from your Draw Pile to your hand.

cards.name: Busy Bees
cards.description: Add a copy of all queenmod:Hive cards in your hand to your draw pile, then upgrade the queenmod:Hive cards in your hand.

cards.name: Busy Bees+
cards.description: Add a copy of your hand to your draw pile, then upgrade your hand.

cards.name: Dignified Slap
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage.
Gain 1 Strength this turn only.

cards.name: Dignified Slap+
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage.
Gain 2 Strength this turn only.

cards.name: Feast
cards.description:
Deal damage equal to your queenmod:Swarm.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Feast+
cards.description: Deal damage equal to your queenmod:Swarm.

cards.name: Feint
cards.description: If the last card played this combat was an Attack, Inflict 1 Weak and draw 1 card

cards.name: Feint+
cards.description: If the last card played this combat was an Attack, Inflict 1 Weak and draw 2 cards

cards.name: Flanking Strike
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage and apply 2 Vulnerable to all enemies.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Flanking Strike+
cards.description:
Innate.
Deal 6 damage and apply 2 Vulnerable to all enemies.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Fortify
cards.description: Gain 4 block for each queenmod:Hive card in your draw pile.

cards.name: Fortify+
cards.description: Gain 5 block for each queenmod:Hive card in your draw pile.

cards.name: Gnat Squadron
cards.description: Deal 1 damage 6 times.

cards.name: Gnat Squadron+
cards.description: Deal 2 damage 6 times.

cards.name: Hive Network
cards.description: Draw 2 cards, For each queenmod:Hive card drawn, gain [E] .

cards.name: Hive Network+
cards.description: Draw 3 cards, For each queenmod:Hive card drawn, gain [E] .

cards.name: Honor Guards
cards.description:
Add 3 queenmod:Bumblebees to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Honor Guards+
cards.description:
Innate.
Add 3 queenmod:Bumblebees to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Killer Queen
cards.description: If you have more Attacks than Skills and Powers, deal 24 damage.

cards.name: Killer Queen+
cards.description: If you have more Attacks than Skills and Powers, deal 30 damage.

cards.name: Knighting
cards.description: Add a queenmod:Hive card in your hand to your deck permanently.

cards.name: Knighting+
cards.description:
Add a queenmod:Hive card in your hand to your deck permanently.
Gain 5 Block.

cards.name: Metamorphosis
cards.description: Replace all queenmod:Drones with queenmod:Hornets, queenmod:Bumblebees, or queenmod:Workerbees.

cards.name: Metamorphosis+
cards.description: Replace all queenmod:Drones with queenmod:Hornets, queenmod:Bumblebees, or queenmod:Workerbees.

cards.name: Military Handbook
cards.description:
Draw 4 cards.
Spend 10 queenmod:Nectar: Attacks in your hand cost 1 less this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Military Handbook+
cards.description:
Draw 5 cards.
Spend 10 queenmod:Nectar: Attacks in your hand cost 1 less this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Overwhelming Force
cards.description: Deal damage to all enemies equal to the number of cards in your deck.

cards.name: Overwhelming Force+
cards.description: Deal damage to all enemies equal to the number of cards in your deck.

cards.name: Overwhelming Power
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
Gain [E] for every 10 cards in your deck.

cards.name: Overwhelming Power+
cards.description:
Deal 14 damage.
Gain [E] for every 10 cards in your deck.

cards.name: Perfect Landing
cards.description:
queenmod:Finisher.
If you've played 5 or more cards this turn, gain 7 block.

cards.name: Perfect Landing+
cards.description:
queenmod:Finisher.
If you've played 5 or more cards this turn, gain 10 block.

cards.name: Plan of Action
cards.description:
Choose to gain Strength, Dexterity, queenmod:Production or a mixture of all three.
queenmod:Recruit a queenmod:Hive card based on your choice.

cards.name: Plan of Action+
cards.description:
Innate.
Choose to gain Strength, Dexterity, queenmod:Production or a mixture of all three.
queenmod:Recruit a queenmod:Hive card based on your choice.

cards.name: Promotion
cards.description:
Promote a queenmod:Hive card in your draw pile to a queenmod:Commander and add it to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Promotion+
cards.description:
Promote a queenmod:Hive card in your draw pile to a queenmod:Commander and add it to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Protect The Queen!
cards.description:
When you would take attack damage, Exhaust a queenmod:Bumblebee from your draw pile to gain its Block.
queenmod:Recruit 2 queenmod:Bumblebees.

cards.name: Protect The Queen!+
cards.description:
When you would take attack damage, Discard a queenmod:Bumblebee from your draw pile to gain its Block.
queenmod:Recruit 2 queenmod:Bumblebees.

cards.name: Rally
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Add queenmod:Drones to your draw pile equal to your Strength.

cards.name: Rally+
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
Add queenmod:Drones to your draw pile equal to your Strength.

cards.name: Reinforcements
cards.description: At the start of your turn, play a non queenmod:Drone queenmod:Hive card from your draw pile.

cards.name: Reinforcements+
cards.description: At the start of your turn, play a non queenmod:Drone queenmod:Hive card from your draw pile.

cards.name: Repurpose
cards.description: Exhaust all queenmod:Drones in your hand and draw pile. Gain 1 queenmod:Production for each.

cards.name: Repurpose+
cards.description: Exhaust all queenmod:Drones in your hand and draw pile. Gain 1 queenmod:Production for each.

cards.name: Strategic Genius
cards.description: When you draw a card this turn, gain 1 Strength this turn only.

cards.name: Strategic Genius+
cards.description: When you draw a card this turn, gain 1 Strength this turn only.

cards.name: Swarm Economics
cards.description:
Recall your queenmod:Swarm for the turn.
Gain [E] for every 5 queenmod:Swarm.

cards.name: Swarm Economics+
cards.description:
Recall your queenmod:Swarm for the turn.
Gain [E] for every 4 queenmod:Swarm.

cards.name: Tea Time
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block and 8 Nectar.
Costs 1 more for each Attack in your hand.

cards.name: Tea Time+
cards.description:
Gain 10 Block and 10 Nectar.
Costs 1 more for each Attack in your hand.

cards.name: War Buzz
cards.description: Exhaust all non-attacks in your hand, replace them with queenmod:Hornets.

cards.name: War Buzz+
cards.description: Exhaust all non-attacks in your hand, replace them with queenmod:Hornets.

cards.name: War Machine
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage, if Fatal increase this card's queenmod:Production by 1.
Gain 1 queenmod:Production.

cards.name: War Machine+
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage, if Fatal increase this card's queenmod:Production by 1.
Gain 1 queenmod:Production.

cards.name: War Trumpet
cards.description: When you play an Attack this turn, gain 1 Block and add a queenmod:Drone to your Draw Pile.

cards.name: War Trumpet+
cards.description: When you play an Attack this turn, gain 1 Block and add a queenmod:Drone to your Draw Pile.

cards.name: Aggression Policy
cards.description: If you have more Attacks than skills and powers, Attacks are played once more.

cards.name: Aggression Policy+
cards.description: If you have more Attacks than skills and powers, Attacks are played once more.

cards.name: Call to Arms
cards.description:
Fill your hand with queenmod:Drones from your draw pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Call to Arms+
cards.description: Fill your hand with queenmod:Drones from your draw pile.

cards.name: Finishing Blow
cards.description:
queenmod:Finisher.
If you've played 10 or more cards this turn, deal 50 damage.

cards.name: Finishing Blow+
cards.description:
queenmod:Finisher.
If you've played 10 or more cards this turn, deal 80 damage.

cards.name: General Form
cards.description:
When you play a card, spend 5 queenmod:Nectar to gain [E] .
Ethereal.

cards.name: General Form+
cards.description: When you play a card, spend 5 queenmod:Nectar to gain [E] .

cards.name: Honey Shield
cards.description: When you gain queenmod:Nectar, gain 2 block.

cards.name: Honey Shield+
cards.description: When you gain queenmod:Nectar, gain 3 block.

cards.name: Hornet Swarm
cards.description:
Play all queenmod:Hornets in your Hand and Draw Pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Hornet Swarm+
cards.description: Play all queenmod:Hornets in your Hand and Draw Pile.

cards.name: I Am The Swarm
cards.description: Exhaust your Deck, and gain 2 queenmod:Swarm for each card. Split your Swarm among all targets. At the start of your turn, add a random card to your hand.

cards.name: I Am The Swarm+
cards.description: Exhaust your Deck, and gain 3 queenmod:Swarm for each card. Split your Swarm among all targets. At the start of your turn, add a random card to your hand.

cards.name: Killer Bee
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage.
While this is in your draw pile, at the start of your turn, double this card's damage until played.

cards.name: Killer Bee+
cards.description:
Deal 5 damage.
While this is in your draw pile, at the start of your turn, double this card's damage until played.

cards.name: Multiply
cards.description: Add a copy of each queenmod:Hive card in your draw pile to your draw pile.

cards.name: Multiply+
cards.description: Add a copy of each queenmod:Hive card in your draw pile to your draw pile.

cards.name: Nourish
cards.description:
Spend 10 queenmod:Nectar: Recover 10 Health.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Nourish+
cards.description:
Spend 10 queenmod:Nectar: Recover 10 Health.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Secret Weapon
cards.description:
Spend all queenmod:Nectar: Deal triple that amount to an enemy.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Secret Weapon+
cards.description: Spend all queenmod:Nectar: Deal triple that amount to an enemy.

cards.name: Swarm Tactics
cards.description: When you play a card this turn, gain 1 queenmod:Swarm.

cards.name: Swarm Tactics+
cards.description: When you play a card this turn, gain 2 queenmod:Swarm.

relics.name: Queen's Banner
relics.description: At the start of your turn, add a Drone to your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: As long as the banner remains, the nation will never die.

relics.name: Bottled Placeholder
relics.description: Choose a card. Whenever you take play any card, draw the chosen card.

relics.name: Placeholder Relic 2
relics.description: At the start of each combat, gain 1 Strength.

relics.name: Right-Clicky Relic
relics.description:
Usable once per turn.
Evoke your rightmost Orb.
relics.flavorText: The more you right-click it, the more orbs you've evoked in your lifetime.

potions.name: Placeholder Potion
potions.description: Gain 2 Strength. At the end of your turn, lose 2 Strength.

keywords.name: Queenmod:bumblebee
keywords.description: Bumblebees are 1-cost skills that gain 10 block.

keywords.name: Queenmod:commander
keywords.description: A commander is a Hive card that upgrades all Hive cards of the same type in your draw pile.

keywords.name: Queenmod:dance
keywords.description: While this is in your hand, it will list a series of card types. Play them in sequence to reap the rewards!

keywords.name: Queenmod:drone
keywords.description: Drones are 0-cost skills that draw a card and exhaust.

keywords.name: Queenmod:drone+
keywords.description: A Drone+ is a 0-cost skill that draw 2 cards and Exhausts.

keywords.name: Queenmod:finisher
keywords.description: Playing a finisher ends your turn immediately.

keywords.name: Queenmod:flight
keywords.description: Take 50% less damage. On receiving attack damage, lose 1 Flight.

keywords.name: Queenmod:hive
keywords.description: Hive cards are Hornets, Bumblebees, Honeybees and Drones.

keywords.name: Queenmod:hornet
keywords.description: Hornets are 1-cost attacks that deal 11 damage.

keywords.name: Queenmod:nectar
keywords.description: Nectar is used with certain cards to improve their effects.

keywords.name: Queenmod:pollinate
keywords.description: When a Pollinated enemy is attacked, gain 2 Nectar.

keywords.name: Queenmod:production
keywords.description: At the start of your turn, gain 1 Nectar for each Production.

keywords.name: Queenmod:recruit
keywords.description: Transform a Drone in your hand or draw pile into the chosen hive card. Hand is checked before draw pile.

keywords.name: Queenmod:riposte
keywords.description: A Riposte is a 1-cost Attack that deals 9 damage.

keywords.name: Queenmod:riposte+
keywords.description: A Riposte+ is a 1-cost Attack that deals 11 damage.

keywords.name: Queenmod:swarm
keywords.description: Swarm grants you block and damages enemies. It follows the targets of your cards.

keywords.name: Queenmod:workerbee
keywords.description: Worker Bees are 0-cost skills that inflict 1 Pollinate. (When a Pollinated enemy is attacked, gain 2 Nectar)
